subject: Sometimes they just drop dead.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
A dying tuner in box 86, then I disconnected the original tuner and clip
leaded in an Arm Band hack radio to check the rest of the audio chain. So
after that I took out the original tuner, the one that had the shortwave
wave band, then I'll have to remake the front panel too.  These things are
often a crap shoot.

 F-S
